item.title: Cheatsheet for PyTest Configurations
item.description: Multiple tests Run the same test code with many different parameters to create multiple tests. All tests will run even if there is a failure. recs = [(1,2),(2,3),(3,4)] @pytest.mark.parametrize("x, y", recs ) def test_extract_process(x, y): val = my_function(x) assert val == y Fixtures Use fixtures to run code before and after all tests.
